name: chat-stream-ts
description: A typeScript class for llama.cpp chat stream

scripts.test: npm run clean && export NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" && jest --coverage
scripts.chat: npm run build && cd dist/src && node chat.js kimiko "you are a friendly chat partner"
scripts.chatloop: npm run build && cd dist/src && node chatloop.js openchat "you are a friendly chat partner"
scripts.int-test: npm run build && cd dist/src && node single.js tinyllama "" "what is 2+2?" >> int-test.log && grep -q "4" int-test.log && echo "int test OK" || echo "int test FAILED"
scripts.test-server: npm run build && cd dist/src && node server.js 3000 kimiko "You are a helpful assitant"
scripts.copy-files: ncp src/settings.json dist/src/settings.json && ncp src/index.html dist/src/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-files && node updateImports.js

author: Ivan Kouznetsov
